hero.title: Ethnic Accessories Collection
hero.paragraph1: ARARA ART presents a collection of contemporary ethnic accessories that combine the elegance of Indonesian culture with modern design.
hero.paragraph2: Handcrafted by local artisans, every detail tells a story ‚Äî of cultural roots, beauty of form, and authentic self-expression.

about.title: About Us
about.description: ARARA ART is an art and craft studio focused on creating contemporary ethnic products with a touch of Indonesian local culture. We blend traditional wisdom with modern style to craft works that carry aesthetic value and stories behind every detail.

cards.title: Craftsmanship
cards.description: Each creation is meticulously handmade by skilled artisans, ensuring every piece carries a unique and personal touch.

cards.title: Cultural Fusion
cards.description: We combine traditional Indonesian motifs with modern design elements to celebrate cultural heritage through contemporary art.

cards.title: Sustainability
cards.description: Our process emphasizes eco-friendly materials and sustainable production practices that honor both nature and culture.

cards.title: Local Community
cards.description: We are committed to empowering the local community by providing training and job opportunities for artisans in our region.

collections.title: COLLECTIONS
collections.paragraph: We work with expert jewelers who use high-quality and enduring materials, from precious metals to responsibly sourced gems.
